TERM: Iterative Improvement

DEFINITION:

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
ial over time:
    * Performance Metrics: Developing performance metrics that enable the system to evaluate its performance and identify areas for improvement.
    * Feedback Mechanisms: Implementing feedback mechanisms that enable the system to receive feedback from humans and other systems.
    * Iterative Improvement: Using iterative improvement techniques to enable the system to refine its performance and adapt to changing circumstances over time.
